channel.title: I am stuck in grub rescue after using Kicksecure on USB
channel.description: Host is also Kicksecure. I used and then stopped using a usb to run Kicksecure persistently and now I am stuck in grub rescue because my desktop is searching for the usb instead of loading into the desktop ssd. I tried booting to the correct ssd in bios, but it still took me to grub rescue after and I was having a hard time getting it to choose the right boot device.

item.title: I am stuck in grub rescue after using Kicksecure on USB
